description: Control eVenement instances Control tickets with an existing e-venement instance. When launched, the user is prompted to enter the host name as well as his login credentials wich will be stored for future authentifications. Once the form submitted, the app will connect to the instance's server and display the access control page (tck.php/ticket/control), and tickets can be controlled directly from there. During use, the app will automatically re-authenticate the user on server periodically to keep the session alive as long as needed.
